comments:
RC2.

I was clicking around in the schema editor (products.exsd in runtime) in the
Documentation tag and got the following in my log. No error dialogs.

After I got the error I switched back to the Definition and got a stack with
"widget is disposed". I closed the editor and re-opened to continue working.
